verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with his <S%H7186>hard<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan,<s%> the <S%H1281>fleeing<s%> <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> and <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> the <S%H6129>twisted<s%> <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> and he will <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> that is in the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, am its <S%H5341>keeper.<s%> I will <S%H8248>water<s%> it every <S%H7281>moment.<s%> Lest anyone <S%H6485>damage<s%> <S%H5341>it,<s%> I will keep it <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H2534>Wrath<s%> is not in <S%H8068>me,<s%> but if I should find briers and <S%H7898>thorns,<s%> I <S%H5414>would<s%> do <S%H4421>battle!<s%> I would <S%H6585>march<s%> on them and I would <S%H6702>burn<s%> them <S%H3162>together.<s%>
Or else let him take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength,<s%> that he may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H6213>me.<s%> Let him make peace with <S%H7965>me.<s%>"

In days to <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will take <S%H8327>root.<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H6692>blossom<s%> and <S%H6524>bud.<s%> They will <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H8570>fruit.<s%>
Has he <S%H5221>struck<s%> them as he <S%H4347>struck<s%> those who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H2026>them?<s%> Or are they killed like those who <S%H2026>killed<s%> them were <S%H2026>killed?<s%>

In <S%H5432>measure,<s%> when you <S%H7971>send<s%> them <S%H7378>away,<s%> you contend with <S%H1898>them.<s%> He has removed them with his <S%H7186>rough<s%> <S%H7307>blast<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the east <S%H6921>wind.<s%>

<S%H2063>Therefore,<s%> by this the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will be <S%H3722>forgiven,<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> is all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of taking <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2403>sin:<s%> that he <S%H7760>makes<s%> all the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> as chalk <S%H68>stones<s%> that are beaten in <S%H5310>pieces,<s%> so that the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and the incense altars shall rise no <S%H2553>more.<s%>

For the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H910>solitary,<s%> a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H5800>deserted<s%> and <S%H7971>forsaken,<s%> like the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> The <S%H5695>calf<s%> will <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7257>there,<s%> and there he will lie down, and <S%H3615>consume<s%> its <S%H5585>branches.<s%>

When its <S%H7105>boughs<s%> are <S%H3001>withered,<s%> they will be broken <S%H7665>off.<s%> The <S%H802>women<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> and set them on <S%H215>fire,<s%> for they are a <S%H5971>people<s%> of no <S%H998>understanding.<s%> Therefore he who <S%H6213>made<s%> them will not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H3335>them,<s%> and he who formed them will show them no <S%H2603>favor.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H2251>thresh<s%> from the flowing <S%H7641>stream<s%> of the <S%H5104>Euphrates<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and you will be <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> by <S%H259>one,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> will be <S%H8628>blown;<s%> and those who were ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and those who were <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> shall <S%H935>come;<s%> and they will <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
